actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare (Subsequently: Human Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare (Subsequently: Human Resources).

official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to provide nutrition programs for handicapped dependents of older Americans.

summary.text: Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to entitle handicapped dependents of eligible individuals to participation in the nutritional programs for the elderly established under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to provide nutrition programs for handicapped dependents of older Americans.
